body.name: Govee Life Smart Air Purifiers for Home Large Room, H13 True HEPA Air Purifiers for Pets with PM2.5 Sensor, Air Quality Index for 99.97% 0.3 micron Particles, Washable Pre-Filter for Pet Hair Lint
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 34 mins
features: Smart Control via App & Alexa: Use Alexa to activate your smart air purifier, or turn it off remotely via GoveeHome App while away from home, making your life smarter and more efficient. Compatible with Alexa, Google Assistant, and IFTTT.

Auto Mode: The sensor in the air purifiers for pets hair detects air quality and auto-adjusts the purification speed based on the air quality. It will stop running when the air quality is excellent for 30 min, saving you more energy.
Breathe Fresh Air: Certified by Energy Star, ETL, FCC, and CA65, cleans a 198 sqft room 5 times an hour and a 991 sqft room once an hour.

Quiet Sleep Mode: With an operating sound as low as 24 dB and a display light on the Air Purifier for wildfires, you can enjoy the uninterrupted fresh air while you sleep. Plus, turn on the pet lock for extra peace of mind.

How does it measure air quality from poor to excellent? The sensor on the side of the air purifier detects the level of particles in the air, such as PM2.5. The colors corresponding to different air quality are as follows: Green-Excellent, Blue-Good, Yellow-Moderate, and Red-Poor. How much power does the Air Purifier consume? Energy-Efficient, consumes less than 0.9kW·h of electricity daily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this little powerhouse
reviews.reviewText: This unit is quiet and works great! The app works great and is easy to use. It’s small and not in your face so it blends in to your surroundings. There area it covers is a a small two bedroom house less than 900 sq feet. I cooked bacon one day and it got a little smoky so I turned this baby on high opened a window and within 2 hours you could barely smell the after effects. It did in two hours what would normally take three days to do. Not to mention I leave it on low daily and I feel like the air is so much cleaner in my house. I don’t see any particles /dust in the rays of sunlight shining in like I always did before. Love this! Buy it you won’t regret it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this air purifier!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this air purifier, and it has far exceeded my expectations; this is probably one of the best air purifiers I’ve owned. Here's why I believe it deserves a solid five-star rating:Exceptional Air Purification: The air in my bedroom feels noticeably fresher and cleaner. I have noticed a significant improvement in air quality since I started using it.Smart Features: With the app, I can easily control the device remotely, adjust fan speeds, set timers, and monitor the air quality in real-time. There’s also an auto setting that will higher or lower the fan speed based on air quality.User-Friendly and Reliable: Setting up and using this air purifier is super easy. The intuitive controls and clear instructions make it user-friendly, even for those who are not tech-savvy.Overall, the this has been a great addition to my home. If you're searching for a smart air purifier that combines performance, aesthetics, and ease of use, I highly recommend giving this a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love Govee products
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love the Govee line of products all of the lighting in my house as well as my humidifier are over Govee and the app is by far the most user friendly experience I have had with any of the other smart home control apps. The purifier itself is an amazing product it is very well built it is pretty quite can be alittle loud if you have it on full blast. The filter actually traps all the cat hair inside I did not think that it would but it has more then enough power to do so and all you have to do is pop the cover off and clean off the filter. The app also keeps you notified on any maintenance the machine might need as well. All in all it is a super well built product and very user friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lasted 6 months from date of purchase. Fan stopped operating at normal speed.Prior to that, I had no issues with the air filter. Great feature set and build quality. Super easy set up. Very small / slim size.I have other Govee products and have loved them. I’m going to chalk up this bad air filter to a fluke and try again. Stay tuned for update.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this on a discount, which made me finally try an air purifier, and turns out I really like it. My home includes a small cat, and two cannabis smokers. Oh, and a Mexican chef ;-). When you look into HEPA filters, you’ll notice that the H 13 is considered medical grade and traps very fine particles. This is a model that you want over the 11 filter type. I also like the fact that this model uses a square filter, which should be easier to replace into the future, and the appliance itself is very lightweight, but moves air very quickly and quietly, and the built-in particulate sensor seems to operate well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just want to say we have a lot of animals at our house. This thing takes the dander and hair out of the air and traps it in the filter. This is a godsend one of the best products I have seen and it helps eliminate the pet smell we have been using it for quite a while and I love how the outside felt piece of the filter is washable. There is a pet lock on there that you should definitely use because pets will turn it off. I love that it has a quiet mode as well. I can have it run while the children are sleeping. My life is better since I bought this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Worked great right out of the box. Made sure to remove the plastic from the filter first.App was easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wake up to fresh air
reviews.reviewText: Compact well made quiet on anything below 3 the highest fan speed. Its in the bedroom so i did have to cover lights wish you could turn them off. But small issue very good air purifier.youll notice better air quality after 1st day.
